name: "¡Traga plomo!"
text: Rápido. Juega esta carta cuando actives la capacidad Combatir de un Apoyo [[Arma de fuego]]. Puedes gastar X fichas de munición adicionales de ese Apoyo. Cuando reveles fichas de Caos para este ataque, revela X fichas de Caos adicionales. Elige 1 para resolverla e ignora el resto.
real_text: Fast. Play when you activate the Fight ability on a [[Firearm]] asset. You may spend X additional ammo tokens from that asset. When you reveal chaos tokens for this attack, reveal X additional chaos tokens. Choose one to resolve and ignore the rest.

name: Armadura de Ardenas
text: [reaction] Cuando se asigne daño a la Armadura de Ardenas, agota la Armadura de Ardenas: Cancela 1 punto de ese daño.
real_text: [reaction] When damage is assigned to Armor of Ardennes, exhaust Armor of Ardennes: Cancel 1 of that damage.

name: Memoria eidética
text: Juega la Memoria eidética como una copia exacta de un Evento [[Inspiración]] de la pila de descartes de cualquier investigador (incluyendo su coste de recursos). Retira ese Evento de la partida. Retira la Memoria eidética de la partida en lugar de descartarla.
real_text: Play Eidetic Memory as an exact copy of an [[Insight]] event in any investigator's discard pile (including its resource cost). Remove that event from the game. Remove Eidetic Memory from the game instead of discarding it.

name: Búsqueda concienzuda
text:
Rápido. Juega esta carta durante cualquier oportunidad de los jugadres [free].
Elige un investigador que esté en tu Lugar. Ese investigador busca 1 carta en su mazo, la roba y baraja su mazo.
real_text:
Fast. Play during any [free] player window.
Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

name: Óbolo de Caronte
text: Permanente. Excepcional. Al obtener experiencia duranta la resolución de un escenario, si no fuiste derrotado durante ese escenario, obtienes 2 puntos de experiencia adicionales. si fuiste derrotado durante ese escenario, mueres.
real_text: Permanent. Exceptional. When earning experience during the resolution of a scenario, if you were not defeated during that scenario, you earn 2 additional experience. If you were defeated during that scenario, you are killed.

name: Lupara
text: Usos (2 municiones). Jugar la Lupara no provoca ataques de oportunidad. [action] Gasta 1 munición: Combatir. Recibes +1 [combat] e infliges +1 de daño para este ataque. Si la Lupara entró en juego en este turno, recibes +1 [combat] adicional e infliges +1 de daño adicional para este ataque.
real_text: Uses (2 ammo). Playing Lupara does not provoke attacks of opportunity. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If Lupara entered play this turn, you get an additional +1 [combat] and deal an additional +1 damage for this attack.
traits: Objeto. Arma. Arma de fuego. Ilegal.

name: Burlar a la muerte
text:
Rápido. Juega esta carta cuando fueses a ser derrotado.
Deja de estar enfrentado a todos los Enemigos enfrentados a ti, descarta todas las cartas  de tu zona de amenaza, cúrate 2 puntos de horror y 2 puntos de daño y muévete a cualquier Lugar revelado que no tenga Enemigos. Si es tu turno, termina tu turno. Retira Burlar a la muerte de la partida.
real_text:
Fast. Play when you would be defeated.
Disengage from each enemy engaged with you, discard all cards in your threat area, heal 2 horror and 2 damage, and move to any revealed location with no enemies. If it is your turn, end your turn. Remove Cheat Death from the game.

name: Distorsión temporal
text: Rápido. Juega esta carta inmediatamente después de que un investigador que esté en tu Lugar termine de resolver una acción durante su turno. Deshaz esa acción (haz que el estado del juego vuelva a ser exactamente igual a como era antes de que se realizara esa acción, incluyendo el coste de ésta).
real_text: Fast. Play immediately after an investigator at your location finishes resolving an action during his or her turn. Undo that action (return the game state to exactly the way it was before that action was performed, including that action's cost).

name: Sello del símbolo arcano
text:
No reveles fichas de Caos de la bolsa de caos para esta prueba. Considera la ficha de Caos revelada para esta prueba como [elder_sign].
Cuando esta prueba termine, retira el Sello del símbolo arcano de la partida.
real_text:
Do not reveal chaos tokens from the chaos bag for this test. Treat the chaos token revealed for this test as an [elder_sign].
When this test ends, remove Seal of the Elder Sign from the game.

name: Periódico
text:
Recibes +2 [intellect] al investigar si no tienes pistas.
[reaction] Cuando fueses a descubrir 1 o más pistas en tu Lugar, si no tienes Pistas: Descubre una pista adicional en tu Lugar.
real_text:
You get +2 [intellect] while investigating if you have no clues.
[reaction] When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location, if you have no clues: Discover an additional clue at your location.
flavor: En los titulares no hay nada acerca de los horrores que habéis visto. Pero la sección de necrológicas es pertubadoramente larga.

name: Luchas internas
text:
Rápido. Juega esta carta después de que comience la fase de Enemigos.
Cancela todos los ataques realizados contra ti por Enemigos que no sean [[Élite]] en esta fase.
real_text:
Fast. Play after the enemy phase begins.
Cancel all attacks made by non-[[Elite]] enemies against you this phase.

name: Llave de Ys
text: Recibes +1 a cada una de tus habilidades por cada punto de horror que haya sobre la Llave de Ys. Obligado - Cuando fuese a ser colocada cualquier cantidad de horror sobre ti: Coloca 1 punto de ese horror sobre la Llave de Ys. Obligado - Cuando la Llave de Ys abandone el juego: Descarta las 10 primeras cartas de tu mazo.
real_text: You get +1 to each of your skills for each horror on Key of Ys. Forced - When any amount of horror would be placed on you: Place 1 of that horror on Key of Ys. Forced - When Key of Ys leaves play: Discard the top 10 cards of your deck.

name: Dim Carcosa
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if you have no sanity remaining).
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail, take 1 horror.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail and Hastur is in play, place 1 clue on your location [[(from the token bank)]].
[elder_thing]: -3. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Monster]] or [[Ancient One]] enemy, lose 1 action.
real_text: Easy / Standard [skull]: -2 (-4 instead if you have no sanity remaining). [cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail, take 1 horror. [tablet]: -3. If you fail and Hastur is in play, place 1 clue on your location (from the token bank). [elder_thing]: -3. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Monster]] or [[Ancient One]] enemy, lose 1 action.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the amount of horror on you.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail, take 2 horror.
[tablet]: -5. If you fail and Hastur is in play, place 1 clue on your location [[(from the token bank)]].
[elder_thing]: -5. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt against a [[Monster]] or [[Ancient One]] enemy, lose 1 action.

name: Madness Coils
text: Hastur cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 3[per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.
real_text: Hastur cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 3[per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.
flavor:
And now, far away, over leagues of tossing cloud-waves, I saw the moon dripping with spray; and beyond, the towers of Carcosa rose behind the moon.
 – Robert W. Chambers, "In the Court of the Dragon," <u>The King in Yellow</u>
back_text:
The investigators must decide (choose one):
 - Any investigator tests [willpower] (4) to snap out of it. If successful, advance to agenda 2a. If failed, you must choose an option you have yet to choose.
 - Any investigator tests [intellect] (4) to remember that you've done this before. If successful, advance to agenda 2a. If failed, you must choose an option you have yet to choose.
 - This can't be real. This can't be real. This can't be real. Each investigator takes 2 horror. Advance to agenda 2a.
 - The investigators faint and awaken some time later. Advance to agenda 2a and place 1 doom on it.
back_flavor: Turning a corner, you nearly bump into a nurse with light brown hair and sharp features. You tell her about the violent patients and the strange things you've seen, but she doesn't listen. When you inquire about Daniel, she informs you that he is a friend of the King and that he resides in the palace.

name: Madness Drowns
text: Hastur gets +1 fight and cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 5[per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.
real_text: Hastur gets +1 fight and cannot be defeated. Forced - If there is at least 5[per_investigator] damage on Hastur: Advance this agenda.
flavor:
I thought, too, of The King in Yellow wrapt in the fantastic colors of his tattered mantle, and that bitter cry of Cassilda, "Not upon us, oh King, not upon us!"
– Robert W. Chambers, "The Mask," <u>The King in Yellow</u>
back_text:
Spawn the set-aside Beast of Aldebaran enemy at the Palace of the King.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
back_flavor:
"Ah, if it isn't our final guest," the doorman announces. "Miss Devine, your presence here has been long awaited." The creature slithers up the side of the palace. You swear you've seen the symbol on her amulet before. Wait, that can't be right.
"Well, now the <u>real</u> party can begin," it roars.

name: Madness Dies
text:
Hastur gets +2 fight.
Hastur cannot be defeated unless you "know the secret."
real_text:
Hastur gets +2 fight.
Hastur cannot be defeated unless you "know the secret."
flavor:
...I cannot forget Carcosa, where black stars hang in the heavens, where the shadows of men’s thoughts lengthen in the afternoon, when the twin suns sink into the Lake of Hali, and my mind will bear forever the memory of the Pallid Mask.
 – Robert W. Chambers, "The Repairer of Reputations," <u>The King in Yellow</u>
back_text: Check Campaign Log. - If you have more (or equal) Conviction than Doubt, proceed to (→R4). - If you have more Doubt than Conviction, proceed to (→R5).
back_flavor: The sky falls. Cloud-wisps lash into the earth, and the dozens of moons in the sky shatter. Shards of the cosmic entities above plunge into the ground and assault the city. The dark reflections of Mont Saint-Michel which floats upside down above you starts to descend. They abbey crashes into the king's palace, launching ebony debris in all directions. Hastur's hideous echoing laughter haunts your mind. It is done.

name: In Lost Carcosa
text: Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.
real_text: Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.
flavor: You have opened the path to Carcosa in order to stop those who wish to free Hastur from his prison in the stars. Only you can put an end to this madness!
back_text: Spawn the set-aside The Man in the Pallid Mask enemy at the Palace of the King.
back_flavor:
A shadow creeps along the wall beside you, and your heart leaps into your throat. You turn, and a figure flits away just out of sight. Either your mind is playing tricks on you, or someone else is in the theatre.
You follow the direction of the shadow, rounding a nearby corner. At the far end of the hall, he stands awaiting you: the man who wears the Pallid Mask, the Stranger whose steps you have haunted for so many weeks. You remember that you have been here before.
The theatre dissolves around you. The bright glare of two suns pierce into your eyes from above. "Do you remember now?" he asks. He turns and vanishes into the aether, as if taunting you to follow.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.I)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated. Objective - While the lead investigator is at The Man in the Pallid Mask's location, he or she may spend [action] [action] [action] to advance.
real_text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated. Objective - While the lead investigator is at The Man in the Pallid Mask's location, he or she may spend [action] [action] [action] to advance.
flavor: It is time to finally confront the Stranger and learn the truth about his identity, once and for all.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.II)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by his [action] ability. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by his [action] ability, advance.
real_text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by his [action] ability. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by his [action] ability, advance.
flavor: It is time to finally confront the Stranger and learn the truth about his identity, once and for all.
back_text: Put the set-aside Hastur [[(The King in Yellow)]] enemy into play next to the act deck. For the remainder of the scenario, Hastur is considered to be in play but is not at any location. Remove The Man in the Pallid Mask from the game.

name: Search For the Stranger (v.III)
text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by damage. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by damage, advance.
real_text: Each investigator cannot discover clues. The Man in the Pallid Mask cannot be defeated except by damage. Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be defeated by damage, advance.
flavor: It is time to finally confront the Stranger and learn the truth about his identity, once and for all.
back_text: Spawn the set-aside Hastur [[(Lord of Carcosa)]]enemy at The Man in the Pallid Mask's location. Remove The Man in the Pallid Mask from the game.

name: The King in Tatters
text: [free] If there are no clues on your location: Remove each investigator's clues from the game. Flip your location over and resolve the text on the other side. Objective - If Hastur is defeated, advance.
real_text: [free] If there are no clues on your location: Remove each investigator's clues from the game. Flip your location over and resolve the text on the other side. Objective - If Hastur is defeated, advance.
flavor:
...I heard the King in Yellow whispering to my soul: "It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God!"
 – Robert W. Chambers, "In the Court of the Dragon," <u>The King in Yellow</u>
back_text: - If Hastur [[(The Tattered King)]] was the version of Hastur that was defeated, proceed to (→R1). - If Hastur [[(The King in Yellow)]] was the version of Hastur that was defeated, proceed to (→R2). - If Hastur [[(Lord of Carcosa)]] was the version of Hastur that was defeated, proceed to (→R3).
back_flavor:
A chorus of cries echoes throughout your mind. Chaotic organ chords torture your ears. You fall to your knees and blood drips from your eyes. The realm of Carcosa shatters into millions of pieces and fades into the empty void of space.
Curtains fall.

name: Shores of Hali
flavor:
Along the shore the cloud waves break,
The twin suns sink behind the lake,
The shadows lengthen
In Carcosa
 – Robert W. Chambers, <u>The King in Yellow</u>

name: Bleak Plains
text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.
real_text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.
flavor:
On every side of me stretched a bleak and desolate expanse of plain, covered with a tall overgrowth of sere grass, which rustled and whistled in the autumn wind...
 – Ambrose Bierce, "An Inhabitant of Carcosa"

name: Bleak Plains
text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.
real_text: While you are at Bleak Plains, you cannot play [[Ally]] assets.
flavor:
On every side of me stretched a bleak and desolate expanse of plain, covered with a tall overgrowth of sere grass, which rustled and whistled in the autumn wind...
 – Ambrose Bierce, "An Inhabitant of Carcosa"

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
flavor:
So old seemed these relics, these vestiges of vanity and memorials of affection and piety, so battered and worn and stained...
 – Ambrose Bierce, "An Inhabitant of Carcosa"

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
flavor:
So old seemed these relics, these vestiges of vanity and memorials of affection and piety, so battered and worn and stained...
 – Ambrose Bierce, "An Inhabitant of Carcosa"

name: Ruins of Carcosa
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Ruins of Carcosa: Take 1 damage.
flavor:
So old seemed these relics, these vestiges of vanity and memorials of affection and piety, so battered and worn and stained...
 – Ambrose Bierce, "An Inhabitant of Carcosa"

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
flavor: The streets twist and churn without any semblance of logic or reason.

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
flavor: The streets twist and churn without any semblance of logic or reason.

name: Dim Streets
text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
real_text: Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue on Dim Streets: Lose 1 action.
flavor: The streets twist and churn without any semblance of logic or reason.

name: Depths of Demhe
text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.
real_text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.
flavor: Don’t look up.

name: Depths of Demhe
text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.
real_text: While you are at Depths of Demhe, you cannot play fast cards.
flavor: Don’t look up.

name: Dark Spires
flavor:
Night fell and the hours dragged on, but still we murmured to each other of the King and the Pallid Mask, and midnight sounded from the misty spires in the fog-wrapped city.
 – Robert W. Chambers, "The Yellow Sign," <u>The King in Yellow</u>

name: Palace of the King
text: Palace of the King cannot be flipped over unless Hastur has at least 5[per_investigator] damage on him.
real_text: Palace of the King cannot be flipped over unless Hastur has at least 5[per_investigator] damage on him.
flavor:
I pray God will curse the writer, as the writer has cursed the world with this beautiful, stupendous creation, terrible in its simplicity, irresistible in its truth...
 – Robert W. Chambers, "The Repairer of Reputations," <u>The King in Yellow</u>

name: Hastur
text: Cannot be damaged except by story card effects. Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase, if Hastur is ready: Hastur attacks each investigator, in player order [[(regardless of their location)]]. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. [action]: Test [willpower] (X), where X is Hastur's fight value. If you succeed, exhaust Hastur. Any investigator may trigger this action.
real_text: Cannot be damaged except by story card effects. Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase, if Hastur is ready: Hastur attacks each investigator, in player order (regardless of their location). If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. [action]: Test [willpower] (X), where X is Hastur's fight value. If you succeed, exhaust Hastur. Any investigator may trigger this action.

name: Hastur
text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. Massive. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.
real_text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. Massive. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.

name: Hastur
text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.
real_text: Prey - Most remaining sanity. Hunter. If Hastur's attack deals you horror in excess of your sanity, you take 1 damage, as well. While Hastur is being attacked or evaded by an investigator with no remaining sanity, treat each [elder_sign], "+1," "0," or "-1" token that investigator reveals as a [auto_fail] token.

name: Creature Out of Demhe
text: Spawn - Depths of Demhe. Massive. Forced - When Creature out of Demhe's location or a connecting location is flipped over, if Creature out of Demhe is ready: It attacks each investigator at that location.
real_text: Spawn - Depths of Demhe. Massive. Forced - When Creature out of Demhe's location or a connecting location is flipped over, if Creature out of Demhe is ready: It attacks each investigator at that location.

name: Winged One
text: Spawn - Bleak Plains. Retaliate. Forced - After a location is flipped over, if Winged One is ready and unengaged: Move it once toward that location.
real_text: Spawn - Bleak Plains. Retaliate. Forced - After a location is flipped over, if Winged One is ready and unengaged: Move it once toward that location.

name: Dismal Curse
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you have no remaining sanity, this test gets +2 difficulty. If you fail, take 2 damage (4 damage instead if you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity).
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). If you have no remaining sanity, this test gets +2 difficulty. If you fail, take 2 damage (4 damage instead if you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity).

name: Realm of Madness
text: Revelation - Discard cards from play and/or from your hand with a total printed resource cost of at least X, where X is the amount of horror on your investigator. If no cards are discarded by this effect, take 2 horror.
real_text: Revelation - Discard cards from play and/or from your hand with a total printed resource cost of at least X, where X is the amount of horror on your investigator. If no cards are discarded by this effect, take 2 horror.
flavor: ...But stranger still is Lost Carcosa.

name: The Final Act
text: Surge. Revelation - If you have no remaining sanity, place 2 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.
real_text: Surge. Revelation - If you have no remaining sanity, place 2 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.

name: Possession (Traitorous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Traitorous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. You may commit this card to a skill test at your location. That test automatically fails.
real_text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Traitorous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. You may commit this card to a skill test at your location. That test automatically fails.

name: Possession (Torturous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Torturous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Spend 5 resources: Discard Possession (Torturous) from your hand.
real_text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Torturous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Spend 5 resources: Discard Possession (Torturous) from your hand.

name: Possession (Murderous)
text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Murderous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Deal 2 damage to an investigator at your location: Discard Possession (Murderous) from your hand.
real_text: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Possession (Murderous) to your hand. If you have horror on you greater than twice your sanity, you are immediately eliminated and killed. [action] Deal 2 damage to an investigator at your location: Discard Possession (Murderous) from your hand.
